title: A Jupyter Book Template for Research-Based Open Educational Resources in Data Literacy
description: Presentation slides for the RDSC Workshop at Informatik Festival 2025. This presentation describes a Jupyter Book template developed for creating research-based Open Educational Resources (OER) in data literacy. The template supports instructional design components, multiple programming environments, and integrates with GitHub Actions and Zenodo for automated publishing. The template was developed as part of the QUADRIGA project, which creates case studies for teaching data competencies in digital humanities, public administration, and film studies.
